page.title: 07FARMING
page.content:
18 farmers in our area were contacted.
The smallest farm was 45 acres and the largest was one of 500 acres. The average was 200 acres.
The most common crops were grass and barley and the least common were carrots, spinach, maize and oil seed rape.
Four farmers had beef cattle. The numbers ranged from 0 to 100, the average being 60.
13 farmers had dairy cows. The range was between 0 and 250, the average being 100.
Four farms reared calves. The range was between 0 and 250, the average was 150.
